DATASETS.USE_DATASET_BASEURI: Use the baseURI of the dataset

REMOTE.DELETE_REFERENCED_REPO_INFO: The following repositories was referenced by the deleted project. Select the repositories you want to delete.

CONFIG.NO_CONFIG_FOUND: No Remote Access Configuration found. Please, create a new one.

SETTINGS.ALLOW_VISUALIZATION_CHANGE_INFO: Tells if visitor user can customize the visualization mode for itself
SETTINGS.CONCEPT_VISUALIZATION_INFO: Restricts the visualization of the Concept tree for the visitor user. Administrator user will still be able to customize the visualization for itself.
SETTINGS.LEX_ENTRY_VISUALIZATION_INFO: Restricts the visualization of the Lexical Entry list for the visitor user. Administrator user will still be able to customize the visualization for itself.
SETTINGS.ALLOW_INDEX_CHANGE_INFO: Tells if visitor user can customize the index-length for itself
SETTINGS.RENDERING_LANG_INFO: Set the default language(s) used for rendering the resources

SYSTEM.INTRO: In this section you can setup some core aspects of the system. This panel can be accessed also later from Administration dashboard > Configuration

EMAIL.EMAIL_CONFIG_INFO:
Configuration of the PMKI e-mail service. This service will be used to send notifications to the contributors
Note: if this is not properly configured, it will be impossible to send email to contributors, so they will be not able to complete a contribution.
EMAIL.AUTHENTICATION_INFO: Tells if SMTP server requires authentication
EMAIL.MAIL_FROM_INFO: Email address used to send administration emails
EMAIL.MAIL_PASSWORD_INFO: Password of the above email address
EMAIL.MAIL_PASSWORD_WARN: Password is stored wihtout encryption on the server
EMAIL.MAIL_ALIAS_INFO: Alias name shown in the administration emails

REMOTE_ACCESS.REMOTE_ACCESS_CONFIG_INFO:
Configuration of the remote triple store that hosts the datasets in PMKI.
Note: if this is not properly configured, the PMKI portal will not be able to create remotedatasets for hosting stable resources.
REMOTE_ACCESS.URL_INFO: URL of the remote triple store
REMOTE_ACCESS.USERNAME_INFO: Username of the remote triple store (if authentication is required)
REMOTE_ACCESS.PASSWORD_INFO: Password of the remote triple store (if authentication is required)

VB_CONFIG.VB_CONFIG_INFO:
Configuration of the VocBench/SemanticTurkey instance dedicated to the development of unstable resources.
Note: if this is not properly configured, the PMKI portal will not be able to connect with VocBench, so it will be impossible to accept contribution of under-development resources.
VB_CONFIG.VB_URL_INFO: URL of the VocBench istance accessible by the contributors
VB_CONFIG.ST_HOST_INFO: Complete URL (protocol+hostname+port) of the SemanticTurkey host
VB_CONFIG.ADMIN_EMAIL_INFO: Email of the administrator of VocBench/SemanticTurkey
VB_CONFIG.ADMIN_PASSWORD_INFO: Password of the administrator of VocBench/SemanticTurkey

COMMONS.MAIL_PASSWORD_WARN: Password is stored wihtout encryption on the server

ALIGNMENTS.METADATA_NOT_FOUND: Unable to find metadata about the current dataset in the MetadataRegistry. Please profile the dataset by clicking the button.

COMMONS.EMAIL_INFO: This will be used to send you an email with the response of the contribution evaluation

DEV.CONVERSION_REQUIRED_INFO: The data requires conversion from a non-RDF format

METADATA.IDENTITY_INFO: If left empty, an IRI will be generated by the system

STABLE.IM_OWNER: I'm the owner of the resource
STABLE.CONTRIBUTOR_IS_OWNER: The contributor is the owner of the resource?

LOAD.EMAIL_ADDRESS_INFO: The email address with which you submitted the contribution
LOAD.DATASET_NAME_INFO: The dataset name provided in the notification email of contribution approval

SETTINGS.SUBCLASS_FILTER_INFO: Here you can create filters in order to hide subClasses of classes

CONCEPT.USE_SEARCH_MSG: Please use the search field to retrieve concepts

UNSAFE_WARN.ELEMENT_COUNT: This Concept tree has an amount of top concepts ({{elemCount}}) that exceeds the limit set in the settings ({{safeToGoLimit}}).
UNSAFE_WARN.PERFORMANCE_ISSUE: Retrieving them all could be a long process, you might experience performance decrease or it might even hang the system.
UNSAFE_WARN.SWITCH_MODE: It is recommended to switch from 'Hierarchy based' to 'Search based' visualization mode from the
UNSAFE_WARN.SELECT_SCHEME: You can also reduce the amount of top concepts by selecting a scheme from the 'Scheme' panel.
UNSAFE_WARN.FORCE_INIT: If you want to force the Concept tree initialization at your own risk, click

SETTINGS.TOP_CONCEPTS_LIMIT_INFO: Sets the maximum amount of top concepts visible in the tree. This setting prevents the initialization of a tree that might cause performance issues

LEX_ENTRY.USE_SEARCH_MSG: Please use the search field to retrieve lexical entries

UNSAFE_WARN.ELEMENT_COUNT: This LexicalEntry list has an amount of elements ({{elemCount}}) that exceeds the limit set in the settings ({{safeToGoLimit}}).
UNSAFE_WARN.PERFORMANCE_ISSUE: Retrieving them all could be a long process, you might experience performance decrease or it might even hang the system.
UNSAFE_WARN.CHANGE_INDEX_LENGHT: to change the index lenght from 1-char to 2-char or
UNSAFE_WARN.SWITCH_MODE: to switch from 'Index based' to 'Search based' visualization mode from the
UNSAFE_WARN.SELECT_LEXICON: You can also reduce the amount of lexical entries by selecting a lexicon from the 'Lexicon' panel.
UNSAFE_WARN.FORCE_INIT: If you want to force the lexical entry list initialization at your own risk, click

SETTINGS.LEX_ENTRIES_LIMIT_INFO: Sets the maximum amount of lexical entries visible in the list. This setting prevents the initialization of a list that might cause performance issues
SETTINGS.INDEX_LENGHT_INFO: Tells if the Lexical Entry index is 1-char or 2-char based

GRAPHS.EXPORT_SNAPSHOT: Export a snapshot of the graph (.svg)

SETTINGS.HIDE_LITERAL_NODES_INFO: If checked, all the literal nodes will be hidden in the graph

LINKS_FILTER.TOO_MUCH_RELATIONS_WARNING: The resource you are expanding has a big amount of relations, thus it would generate a lot of links and nodes that could confuse the graph visualization. It is highly recommended to filter out some relations in order to limit the graph size.

PARTITIONS_FILTER.PARTITIONS_FILTER_INFO: Select the partitions of the resource description that will be shown when expanding a node.
PARTITIONS_FILTER.ALL_PARTITIONS_HIDDEN_WARN: If all the partitions are hidden the expansion of a node will not produce any effect
PARTITIONS_FILTER.CHECK_PARTITION_FOR_ALL_TYPES: Check selected partition in all roles
PARTITIONS_FILTER.UNCHECK_PARTITION_FOR_ALL_TYPES: Uncheck selected partition in all roles

WELCOME_W_INST_NAME.POWERED_BY: {{instanceName}} is powered by the Public Multilingual Knowledge Infrastructure

WELCOME_WO_INST_NAME.PMKI: Public Multilingual Knowledge Infrastructure for the Digital Single Market

RENDERING.DESCRIPTION: Select the languages (and their order) used for rendering the resources

VALUE_FILTER.DESCRIPTION: Select the languages that will be shown when filtering literal values in resource descriptions. Toggle the filter in order to hide the values with the unselected languages.

STATUS.RESOURCE_NOT_EXISTING: This resource is not available in the current project
STATUS.RESOURCE_UNKNOWN_HOST: This resource is not available on accessible local projects nor can be reached on the Web

SETTINGS.SEARCH_MODE_INFO: Search always looks for the input string among the lexicalizations
SETTINGS.RESTRICT_TO_SCHEME: Restrict the search to the active skos:ConceptScheme(s)

USER.NO_USER_REGISTERED_MSG: PMKI has detected that no user has yet registered. In order to use the platform, you need to create an administrator account by entering personal data and login credentials.

LANGUAGE.NO_LANG_INFO: No language selected implicitly means all languages
